description: Labcorp Payor Code Database for Utah
usage: This file maps insurance providers to Labcorp payor codes. Use getPayorCode() from insuranceHelper.js to access.

notes.medicaid: All Utah Medicaid plans (both MCO and FFS) use payor code 'UT' per Labcorp documentation
notes.medicare: Medicare uses payor code '05' and is not editable in Labcorp Link
notes.commercial: Commercial plans require lookup using 'Payor Name Lookup' feature in Labcorp Link
notes.billing: For MCO Medicaid, may need to select 'Private Insurance' bill method instead of 'Medicaid'

instructions.whenUnknown: If payor code is null, the automation will use Payor Name Lookup feature automatically
instructions.addNewCode: After looking up a code, add it to PAYOR_CODES in insuranceHelper.js for future use
instructions.verification: Always verify payor codes in Labcorp Link portal for accuracy
